title: 404 Error for Worlds Page for NA
body:
http://worlds.lolesports.com/en_US/ is giving a 404 error.

"Looks like you're lost.
Need a map? Error 404: We couldn't find the page you're looking for."

replies.body: I believe it was down for awhile but it seems to be back up and running. Is it still down for you?

It's on twitch.tv/riotgames

Still World website down. :(
